Liushutong characters (1)

稜字的基本解释

稜
léng

稜
lēng
同“棱”。

稜
líng
同“棱”。

稜字的汉语字典释义

[①]［léng］
［《廣韻》魯登切，平登，來。］
(1)物体的棱角。
(2)引申谓突出，挺露。
(3)威势。
(4)打；揍。
[②]［lèng］
［《正字通》魯鄧切］
(1)田埂，田间土垄。古亦用以为约计田亩远近多少的单位。
(2)失神，发呆。参见“稜2稜挣挣”。

稜字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【禾字部】　稜； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页855第12
【廣韻】魯登切【韻會】【正韻】盧登切，?音楞。【前漢·李廣傳】威稜憺乎鄰國。【註】李奇曰：神靈之威曰稜。　又稻名。烏稜。　又藥名。三稜。又香附子，名水三稜。　又【廣韻】俗棱字。凡物有廉角者曰觚稜。【班固·西都賦】上觚稜而棲金爵。【註】稜，柧也。柧與觚同。　又【韻會】魯鄧切，楞去聲。農人指田遠近多少曰幾稜。　又叶良中切，音龍。【班固·東都賦】俯仰乎乾坤，參象乎聖躬。目中夏而布德，瞰四裔而抗稜。

稜字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
稜字的起名意思

暂无。

edge
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［léng］
["Guangyun" Lu Dengqie, Ping Deng, come. ]
(1) The edges and corners of the object.
(2) The extension is that it is prominent and revealing.
(3) Power.
(4) Beat; beat.
[②]［lèng］
["Zhengzitong" Lu Dengqi]
(1) Field ridges, soil ridges in the field. In ancient times, it was also used as a unit to approximate the distance of a field.
(2) Lost, in a daze. See "Legging 2 Edges Earn Earn".
edge
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Set 2] [He Zi Department] 　 Leng; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 855 No. 12
[Guang Yun] Lu Dengqie [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Lu Dengqie,? Yin Leng. [Previous Han·Li Guang Chuan] Wei Ling is almost like neighboring countries. [Note] Li Qi said: The power of the gods is the edge.　 Also the name of rice. Wuling.　Also the name of the medicine. Three-sided. And Xiangfuzi, named water three-lens.　[Guangyun] Vulgar word. Anything with a low angle is called a sharp edge. 【Bangu·Xidu Fu】The golden sacred sacred on the edge. 【Note】Ling, Qi Ye. The 柧 and the goblin are the same.　[Rhyme Club] Lu Deng cut, dumbfounded. The farmer refers to how far and near the field is.　Yeliang cut again, Yinlong. [Ban Gu·Dongdu Fu] The pitching is the heaven and the earth, the reference is the holy bow. In the eyes of Xia and Bude, looking at Si Yi and resisting the edge.
